caption.paragraph: TABLE 1. Collection sites with octocoral species.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Larak Island:
Sinularia erecta
Tixier-Durivault, 1945
;
Sarcophyton minusculum
n. sp. ;
Menella
sp.

Close to Strait of Hormuz (mentioned by
Stiasny, 1940
):
Subergorgia suberosa (
Pallas, 1766
)
(described as
Subergorgia perezi
by
Stiasny, 1940
);
Menella bahrelfarsi
Stiasny, 1940
(described as
Echinogorgia bahrelfarsi
by Stiasny);
Echinogorgia macrospiculata
Thomson & Simpson, 1909
;
Junceella juncea (
Pallas, 1766
)
(described as
Junceella fragilis
Ridley, 1884
, by
Stiasny, 1940
).
